MediaStreamTrackAudioSourceNodeMediaStre.summary: The Web Audio API's MediaStreamTrackAudioSourceNode() constructor creates and returns a new object whose audio is taken from the specified in the given options object.

remarks.para: Another way to create a MediaStreamTrackAudioSourceNode is to call the method, specifying the from which you want to obtain audio.

MediaStreamTrackAudioSourceNodeMediaStre.returns: A new object representing the audio node whose media is obtained from the specified media track.
